title: Every Young Man's Battle: Strategies for Victory in the Real World of Sexual Temptation
description: In this world you're surrounded by sexual images that open the door to temptation. They're everywhere -- on TV, billboards, magazines, music, the internet and so easy to access that a fella asks, What to do? If a young Christian man is thinking about pre-marital sex and lust, here are the answers.
author: Stephen F. Arterburn
